general.label: MaxMind GeoIP
general.comment: If you would like to use more accurate database, use the paid versions of the same files

country_file.label: GeoIp filename
country_file.comment: Download and unzip file under the 'MAGETO_ROOT/lib/MaxMind/GeoIP/data' folder if you don't have it

city_file.label: GeoCity filename
city_file.comment: Download and unzip file under the 'MAGETO_ROOT/lib/MaxMind/GeoIP/data' folder if you don't have it

general.label: Usps Address Verification (United States addresses only)

smart_zip_correction.label: Smart ZIP+4 code correction allowed
smart_zip_correction.comment: Auto-append ZIP code with 4-digit add-on, when the rest of address is correct.

use_default_date_value.label: Use first avilable date as default value

delivery_processing_end_time.label: Delivery processing day ends at
delivery_processing_end_time.comment: When placing order after this time, first available date will be shifted to the next day

date_offset.label: Delivery will be available since first available day (order date) plus this value

date_offset_dynamic.label: Use per product delivery date offset
date_offset_dynamic.tooltip: When multiple products will have different date offset, maximum offset will be used

date_offset_product_attribute.label: Delivery date offset attribute
date_offset_product_attribute.comment:
Text and dropdown attribute types are shown only.
Attribute should be saved with enabled 'Used in Product Listing' option.

date_period.label: Period in days, while delivery will be available, since first available day

exclude_weekend.label: Exclude Weekend Days
exclude_weekend.comment: See `System > Configuration > General > Locale Options > Weekend Days` option

redirect_to_checkout.label: Redirect to firecheckout after adding an item to the shopping cart

empty_layout.label: Use Empty Page Layout with store logo only

shipping_method_code.comment: Use this field to enter shipping code, if you are not able to find it in previous selectbox.

hide_shipping_if_free.label: Hide Other Shipping Methods if Free is Available

shipping_address_checkbox_state.label: Ship to the same address checkbox is checked by default

paypalexpress_register.label: Register customer during Paypal Express checkout if prompted

newsletter_checkbox_state.label: Newsletter checkbox is checked by default

giftcard.label: Show Giftcard Field
giftcard.comment: Works with Magento Enterprise/Pro Versions Only

order_review.label: Show Address Review Block
order_review.comment: Show address review block, inside checkout review section. Useful for EU countries

address_form_status.label: Address Form Fields
address_form_status.comment: Before changing some of the fields, be sure that your payment/shipping provider does not require them

postcode.label: Zip/Postal Code
postcode.comment: See the Postal Code configuration at System > Configuration > General > Countries Options

region.label: State/Province
region.comment: See the Region configuration at System > Configuration > General > States Options

ajax.label: Ajax save and reload rules
ajax.comment: Do not overuse this options: the more fields you will select - the more ajax requests will be done during form filling.

payment-method.label: Payment methods depends on
payment-method.tooltip:
1. Add order total, if you are using min/max order total option to filter available payment methods
2. Add billing address if you are using allowed countries option

shipping-method.label: Shipping methods depends on
shipping-method.comment: Default Values: Cart contents, Shipping Address
shipping-method.tooltip:
1. Add order total, if you are using min/max order total option to filter available shipping methods
2. Add coupon code, if you have coupons for shipping price

review.label: Order total (Review) depends on
review.tooltip:
1. Add the shipping address if you are using tax rate or discount for some addresses
2. Add payment method, if you are using discount/fee for some of the payment methods

editable.label: Allow to edit shopping cart contents
editable.comment: We recommend to use 2columns layout when using this option. See the General options section.

image.label: Show product image
image.comment: We recommend to use 2columns layout when using this option. See the General options section.
